channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: FanDuel Promo Code: Bet $5, Get $150 in Bonus Bets If Your Bet Wins
item.description: Bet $5 or more, get $150 back in bonus bets if your bet wins with our FanDuel sportsbook offer for new users after their first bet wins.

item.title: What Does Mauricio Pochettino Want From Gio Reyna? 'Show He’s More Mature'
item.description: What's Mauricio Pochettino's expectation for Gio Reyna? "If a player doesn’t behave well, he’s not going to be with us."

item.title: Oklahoma City Spark, Cascade Join Athletes Unlimited Softball League
item.description: The Oklahoma City Spark have joined the Athletes Unlimited Softball League as one of two new teams in the growing league.

item.title: NCAA Puts Michigan State Football on 3 Years of Probation, Vacates 14 Wins
item.description: The NCAA put Michigan State football on three years probation and penalized the school $30,000, among other stiff handouts.

item.title: Joel Klatt's CFP Breakdown: Who Controls Their Destiny and Who Needs Chaos
item.description: Who is making the CFP? Joel Klatt points to which teams are in control, which teams are on the bubble, and which teams needs a miracle.

item.title: MSU hit with 3-year probation, 14 wins vacated
item.description: Due to NCAA violations, Michigan State football was placed on a three-year probation Wednesday, a school spokesperson confirmed.

item.title: St. Brown apologizes if 'Trump dance' offended
item.description: Lions wide receiver Amon-Ra St. Brown apologized on his podcast if he "offended anyone" with his "Trump dance" touchdown celebration Sunday while Pres...

item.title: Clippers' Beal to have season-ending hip surgery
item.description: Clippers guard Bradley Beal has a fracture in his left hip and will undergo season-ending surgery.

item.title: McDaniel 'indebted' to Quinn over sobriety fight
item.description: Mike McDaniel said he is "forever indebted" to Dan Quinn because the Commanders coach helped steer him toward sobriety.

item.title: Sources: AD won't play until OK from Mavs owner
item.description: Mavericks governor Patrick Dumont wants medical data on Anthony Davis' left calf strain before giving his OK for the 10-time All-Star to return, sourc...
